about_the_game:
Add “Eden” by Au5 & Danyka Nadeau to your song library

Artist Description
Let Au5 and Danyka Nadeau take you on an ambient dubstep ride to experience shades of new colours in the neon skies over “Eden”.

Music Pack Description
Take a trip to a future dystopia, where neon lights our day and night, cyberpunks and hackers are the new revolutionaries striking back at a technocratic regime. Synth Riders’ “Cyberpunk Essentials” music pack takes you there with 10 carefully selected songs from both established and emerging electronic dance music artists such as Tokyo Machine, Pegboard Nerds, RIOT, and Au5. Completing your experience is the brand new environment named “Dystopia”, where you take a road trip through a future city under the watchful gaze of “Big Brother”.

name: Synth Riders - Au5 - "Eden"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
